item.title: Migrating over to Hugo
item.description: “Migrating over to Hugo is very easy.” This was my thought when I first make a document for my bot. I was astonished by the speed of it. I was able to edit the markdown pages and instantly preview it when I need to. The theme I used was very flexible, and although I had trouble with the Hugo template, I quickly got used to it and changed most of the theme.
